about

Rooted in Long Island, NY. But now based out of Los Angeles, CA. A young visionary sets grounds determined to create history along the path of instrumenting his art to influence his and the lives he will touch. Using his knowledge and resources he steers the minds of the youth to shed light on undyingly important subjects such as mental health, acceptance, and quality through creating music and captivating minds.
